languages.text: "Данный акт расценивается Адептус Механикус как добровольное //мученичество//самодеструкция// во славу Деус Механикус. Данная боевая упряжь категоризирована как когни-броня — дух машины, живущий в ней, силен и мудр, однако он сильно пострадал в последней битве магоса Гракха. Помимо священных литаний и императивов служения Омниссии данные латы транслируют в разум технобрата Тарзуса непрерывный сигнал страдания и агонии".

"The Adeptus Mechanicus regard this act as voluntary //martyrdom//self-destruction// for the glory of the Deus Mechanicus. This battle harness is classified as cogni-armour. The machine spirit living in it is strong and wise, but it took major damage in the course of Magos Gracchus's last battle. Besides sacred litanies and imperatives of service to the Omnissiah, the armour broadcasts a continuous signal of suffering and agony into Tech-Brother Tarzus's mind."
languages.original_text: "Данный акт расценивается Адептус Механикус как добровольное //мученичество//самодеструкция// во славу Деус Механикус. Данная боевая упряжь категоризирована как когни-броня — дух машины, живущий в ней, силен и мудр, однако он сильно пострадал в последней битве магоса Гракха. Помимо священных литаний и императивов служения Омниссии данные латы транслируют в разум технобрата Тарзуса непрерывный сигнал страдания и агонии".

languages.text: 「帝国技術局はこの行為を栄光あるデウス・メカニクスに対する自発//殉教//自己破壊//的なものとみなしている。この戦闘ハーネスはコグニ・アーマーと分類される。この中に住む機械精霊は協力かつ聡明であるが、マゴス・グラックスの最後の戦闘で大きなダメージを受けた。加えて、神聖なる連祷および不可欠な万機神への奉仕で、アーマーは連続した苦痛と苦悩の信号を技術兄弟ターザスの精神に発信している」
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus regard this act as voluntary //martyrdom//self-destruction// for the glory of the Deus Mechanicus. This battle harness is classified as cogni-armour. The machine spirit living in it is strong and wise, but it took major damage in the course of Magos Gracchus's last battle. Besides sacred litanies and imperatives of service to the Omnissiah, the armour broadcasts a continuous signal of suffering and agony into Tech-Brother Tarzus's mind."

traits.locale_text: 「帝国技術局はこの行為を栄光あるデウス・メカニクスに対する自発//殉教//自己破壊//的なものとみなしている。この戦闘ハーネスはコグニ・アーマーと分類される。この中に住む機械精霊は協力かつ聡明であるが、マゴス・グラックスの最後の戦闘で大きなダメージを受けた。加えて、神聖なる連祷および不可欠な万機神への奉仕で、アーマーは連続した苦痛と苦悩の信号を技術兄弟ターザスの精神に発信している」
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: “机械修会认为塔祖斯兄弟的行为是自愿的，是为了万机之神的荣耀进行的//殉道//自我毁灭//之举。这种战斗装备被归类为认知装甲，强大的机魂居住在这套盔甲之中。然而，在格拉古贤者最后那场战斗中，它遭到了严重损害。这套盔甲除了会传递神圣的赞歌，以及服侍欧姆尼塞亚的义务之外，还会一刻不停地向塔祖斯兄弟的意识中传递痛苦与折磨的信号。”
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus regard this act as voluntary //martyrdom//self-destruction// for the glory of the Deus Mechanicus. This battle harness is classified as cogni-armour. The machine spirit living in it is strong and wise, but it took major damage in the course of Magos Gracchus's last battle. Besides sacred litanies and imperatives of service to the Omnissiah, the armour broadcasts a continuous signal of suffering and agony into Tech-Brother Tarzus's mind."

traits.locale_text: “机械修会认为塔祖斯兄弟的行为是自愿的，是为了万机之神的荣耀进行的//殉道//自我毁灭//之举。这种战斗装备被归类为认知装甲，强大的机魂居住在这套盔甲之中。然而，在格拉古贤者最后那场战斗中，它遭到了严重损害。这套盔甲除了会传递神圣的赞歌，以及服侍欧姆尼塞亚的义务之外，还会一刻不停地向塔祖斯兄弟的意识中传递痛苦与折磨的信号。”
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Der Adeptus Mechanicus betrachtet diesen Akt als //Märtyrertum//Selbstzerstörung// aus freien Stücken zum Ruhme des Deus Mechanicus. Diese Kampfpanzerung ist als Cogni-Rüstung klassifiziert. Der Maschinengeist in ihr ist stark und weise, wurde aber in Magos Gracchus' letzter Schlacht schwer beschädigt. Neben heiligen Litaneien und Aufforderungen zum Dienst für den Omnissiah sendet die Rüstung ein kontinuierliches Signal aus Qual und Leid in den Geist von Tech-Bruder Tarzus."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus regard this act as voluntary //martyrdom//self-destruction// for the glory of the Deus Mechanicus. This battle harness is classified as cogni-armour. The machine spirit living in it is strong and wise, but it took major damage in the course of Magos Gracchus's last battle. Besides sacred litanies and imperatives of service to the Omnissiah, the armour broadcasts a continuous signal of suffering and agony into Tech-Brother Tarzus's mind."

traits.locale_text: "Der Adeptus Mechanicus betrachtet diesen Akt als //Märtyrertum//Selbstzerstörung// aus freien Stücken zum Ruhme des Deus Mechanicus. Diese Kampfpanzerung ist als Cogni-Rüstung klassifiziert. Der Maschinengeist in ihr ist stark und weise, wurde aber in Magos Grocchus' letzter Schlacht schwer beschädigt. Neben heiligen Litaneien und Aufforderungen zum Dienst für den Omnissiah sendet die Rüstung ein kontinuierliches Signal aus Qual und Leid in den Geist von Tech-Bruder Tarzus."
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: « L'Adeptus Mechanicus considère cet acte //de sacrifice//d'autodestruction// délibéré comme un hommage rendu à la gloire du Deus Mechanicus. Cette cuirasse est classifiée en tant que cogni-armure. L'esprit de la machine qui l'habite est sage et puissant, mais il a subi des dommages importants au cours du dernier combat du magos Gracchus. Outre les litanies sacrées et les impératifs liés au service de l'Omnimessie, l'armure diffuse dans l'esprit du technofrère Tarzus un signal continu de souffrance et d'agonie. »
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus regard this act as voluntary //martyrdom//self-destruction// for the glory of the Deus Mechanicus. This battle harness is classified as cogni-armour. The machine spirit living in it is strong and wise, but it took major damage in the course of Magos Gracchus's last battle. Besides sacred litanies and imperatives of service to the Omnissiah, the armour broadcasts a continuous signal of suffering and agony into Tech-Brother Tarzus's mind."

traits.locale_text: « L'Adeptus Mechanicus considère cet acte //de sacrifice//d'autodestruction// délibéré comme un hommage rendu à la gloire du Deus Mechanicus. Cette cuirasse est classifiée en tant que cogni-armure. L'esprit de la machine qui l'habite est sage et puissant, mais il a subi des dommages importants au cours du dernier combat du magos Gracchus. Outre les litanies sacrées et les impératifs liés au service de l'Omnimessie, l'armure diffuse dans l'esprit du technofrère Tarzus un signal continu de souffrance et d'agonie. »
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: «El Adeptus Mechanicus considera este acto como //un martirio//una autodestrucción// de carácter voluntario por la gloria del Deus Mechanicus. Este arnés de combate está clasificado como cogniarmadura. El espíritu máquina que lo habita es fuerte y sabio, pero sufrió graves daños durante el transcurso del último enfrentamiento del magos Gracchus. Además de las letanías sagradas y las exhortaciones al servicio del Omnissiah, la armadura transmite una señal constante de sufrimiento y agonía a la mente del tecnohermano Tarzus».
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus regard this act as voluntary //martyrdom//self-destruction// for the glory of the Deus Mechanicus. This battle harness is classified as cogni-armour. The machine spirit living in it is strong and wise, but it took major damage in the course of Magos Gracchus's last battle. Besides sacred litanies and imperatives of service to the Omnissiah, the armour broadcasts a continuous signal of suffering and agony into Tech-Brother Tarzus's mind."

traits.locale_text: «El Adeptus Mechanicus considera este acto como //un martirio//una autodestrucción// de carácter voluntario por la gloria del Deus Mechanicus. Este arnés de combate está clasificado como cogniarmadura. El espíritu máquina que lo habita es fuerte y sabio, pero sufrió graves daños durante el transcurso del último enfrentamiento del magos Gracchus. Además de las letanías sagradas y las exhortaciones al servicio del Omnissiah, la armadura transmite una señal constante de sufrimiento y agonía a la mente del tecnohermano Tarzus».
traits.speaker: Opticon22

languages.text: "Adeptus Mechanicus, bu gönüllü //şehitlik//kendini imha// eylemini Deus Mechanicus'un şanına atfeder. Muharebe giysisi, kavrazırh klasmanındadır. İçerisinde yaşayan makine ruhu, son derece güçlü ve bilge olup Magos Gracchus'un son savaşı sırasında ağır hasar almıştır. Zırh, Hermesih'in hizmetindeki kutsal dualar ve buyruklar dışında Tekno Kardeş Tarzus'un zihnine devamlı olarak acı ve ızdırap sinyalleri de göndermektedir."
languages.original_text: "The Adeptus Mechanicus regard this act as voluntary //martyrdom//self-destruction// for the glory of the Deus Mechanicus. This battle harness is classified as cogni-armour. The machine spirit living in it is strong and wise, but it took major damage in the course of Magos Gracchus's last battle. Besides sacred litanies and imperatives of service to the Omnissiah, the armour broadcasts a continuous signal of suffering and agony into Tech-Brother Tarzus's mind."

traits.locale_text: "Adeptus Mechanicus bu gönüllü //şehitlik//kendini imha// eylemini Deus Mechanicus'un şanına atfeder. Muharebe giysisi kavrazırh klasmanına girmiştir. İçerisinde yaşayan makine ruhu son derece güçlü ve bilgedir ancak Magos Gracchus'un son savaşı sırasında ağır hasar almıştır. Zırh, Hermesih hizmetindeki kutsal dualar ve buyruklar dışında Tekno Kardeş Tarzus'un zihnine devamlı olarak acı ve ızdırap sinyalleri de göndermektedir."
traits.speaker: Opticon22
